  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    ADD_END
    Ends the adding process.
    ADD_START
    Starts the adding process.
    Possible response codes:
    - 0 if the title does not exist
    - 1 if the title exists.
    CHECK
    Checks for the existence of a title.
    Possible response codes:
    - 0 if the title exists.
    - 1 if not.
    NOTHING
    Default value to avoid null.
    Response code: -1.
    SHOULD NOT BE USED IF IT IS NOT A REPLACEMENT FOR null!
    PLAY
    Plays a title.
    Needed data: UUID.
    Possible response codes:
    - 0 if the title cannot be played
    - 1 if the title can be played
    REMOVE
    Adds a title.
    Possible response codes:
    - 0 for success
    - 1 for failure
